title: When Will I Kill?
description: Calissa Walker was just ten years old when she realized she was quite different from everyone else. She had a hunger deep inside that she kept a secret. Driven by a thirst for blood, she navigates through her tortured life with one constant thought, “When will I kill?” After the thirst is awakened by a run-in with a brutally beautiful girl she meets at a coffee shop, she becomes conflicted. Will they become best friends? Or will the beautiful girl fall prey to Calissa? Convinced if she took just one life she would be satisfied, she makes herself a promise; One perfect victim for one perfect crime. After this, she pledges to keep the thirst dormant. But what happens when that one perfect victim isn’t so perfect anymore? Will she give up on her promise? Will her dark secret be her downfall? Torn between the darkness and evil that lies within her, and the delightful, colorful world trying to tame her, her decision could cost her, her very existence.
author: Lori Krause
